title: Museum | Naturalis
text: Discover ourgalleries Our museum is a combined experience of seeing and doing. All ages will experience the beauty and richness of nature in eight impressive galleries. The stories in our museum are told using outstanding pieces in our collection of 42 million plants, animals, fossils and rocks. In the museum you can ask our scientists questions, have your own nature find examined and watch a specimen preparation in person. We can't wait to show you every inch of our museum. Dinosaur age LiveScience RexperienceEye to eye with T. rex 66 million years ago, the Earth was populated by awe-inspiring dinosaurs. Imagine that you could travel back to that time and suddenly stand eye to eye with a T. rexâ€¦ Travel back to the era of dinosaurs The Rexperience is no ordinary museum exhibit. It's an immersive experience! Step inside our futuristic travel agency and board the space capsule... But be sure to buckle your seatbelt, because you're in for a rocky ride! Agendadaily schedule At Naturalis, not a day goes by without extra activities. We'll see you there! Conferences and events Venue hire at Natuturalis Biodiversity and sustainability are at the heart of Naturalis. This is reflected in every event, from climate-neutral venues and responsible catering to sustainable design. All of this takes place in an impressive building with a clear mission: balance between nature and people. This adds significance to every meeting, from conferences to dinners.
